about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a fifth-semester student in the Information Technology program at Universitas Bina Sarana Informatika. Currently, I am deepening my knowledge of web development on both the frontend and backend sides, with the goal of becoming a Full Stack Web Developer. Although I study both areas, I am more inclined toward backend development because I enjoy working with logic, data structures, and understanding how systems operate behind the scenes. I have a strong passion for learning and am committed to continuously improving my skills, especially in adapting to the fast-paced and ever-evolving world of technology.

github.title: GitHub Contributions
github.subtitle: My coding activity over the past year

items.title: Mini E-commerce with Multiple Sellers
items.description: A self-initiated multi-vendor e-commerce platform where multiple sellers can manage their own stores, products, and orders. The platform includes user profiles, seller dashboards, and a local wallet top-up system handled by the admin.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Feel free to contact me if you're interested in collaborating on the development or creation of a website tailored to your needs and vision. I'm ready to help you turn your ideas into a professional, responsive, and visually appealing digital product that will help your business or project grow and stand out in the online world.

email.title: Send me an email
email.hint: Please make sure the email you provide is valid so I can easily reply to your message.

maps.title: My Location
maps.description: I'm located in Depok, West Java. Feel free to reach out if you're in the area!
